content: निर्वृतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Satisfaction, happiness, pleasure, bliss; व्रजति निर्वृतिमेकपदे मनः <ls>V. 2. 9</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 38</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 65</ls>; <ls>Ś. 7. 19</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 64</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">10. 28</ls>; <ls>Ki. 3. 8.</ls> {@--2@} Tranquillity, rest, repose; <ls>Ku. 5. 55</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 208.</ls> {@--3@} Final emancipation or liberation from worldly existence; द्वारं निर्वृतसद्मनो विजयते कृष्णेति वर्णद्वयं <ls>Bv. 4. 14.</ls> {@--4@} Completion, accomplishment. {@--5@} Freedom. {@--6@} Disappearance; death, destruction.
